document.masterDocTitle: A review of Chelonian type specimens (order Testudines)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of Chelonian type specimens (order Testudines)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype :
Not located; originally in UPSZTY (= UUZM ), but apparently lost; listed by Linné & Thunberg (1780:3) and Thunberg (1828:49) , but not by Lönnberg (1896) , Andersson (1900) , Holm (1957) , or Wallin (2001) . MNMZ designated neotype by Fritz (1994:65) .

bibRefCitation.author: Linnaeus, C.
bibRefCitation.refString: Linnaeus, C. (1758) Systema Naturae, per Regna Tria Naturae, secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio Decima, Reformata. [10 th Ed.]. Laurentii Salvii, Holmiae [Stockholm], 824 pp. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 542

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype
: Not located; originally in UPSZTY

subSubSection.paragraph: (= UUZM ), but apparently lost (listed by Thunberg 1828:49 , but not by Lönnberg 1896 , Andersson 1900 , Holm 1957 , or Wallin 2001 ).

Holotype
: Not located; illustrated in the original description (Pl. 675).

bibRefCitation.author: Schneider, J. G.
bibRefCitation.refString: Schneider, J. G. (1783) Allgemeine Naturgeschichte der Schildkroten, nebst einem systematischen Verzeichnisse der einzelnen Arten und zwey Kupfern. J. G. Muller, Leipzig, 364 pp. https: // doi. org / 10.5962 / bhl. title. 5788

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syntypes
(at least 2): Not located; two syntypes illustrated in the original description (Pl. XXVI )
.

Syntypes
(number uncertain): Not located; possibly in the SMNS (Kurek 1917)
.

Syntypes
(number uncertain): apparently MGN 1995 (multiple specimens), and 1672; MGN 1672 designated as lectotype by Karl & Paust (2014:156) and illustrated in the original description (Pl. 4, Fig. 4).

Syntypes
(number uncertain): apparently MGN 1995 (multiple specimens), and 1673; MGN 1673 designated as lectotype by Karl & Paust (2014:156) and illustrated in the original description (Pl. 4, Fig. 1, 3).

Syntypes
(2): NRM CU75037 and 75039 (formerly R1743-44); illustrated in Dalmon (1820:Pl. VI–VII), and in the original description (Pl. III– IV); see also Kurck (1917) and
Sommer et al. (2009)
.

treatmentCitationGroup.paragraph:
Holotype : Not located; possibly SMNS ; illustrated in
Jäger (1861:191)
.

bibRefCitation.author: Giebel, C. G.
bibRefCitation.refString: Giebel, C. G. (1866 a) Cistudo anhaltina n. sp. aus der Latdorfer Braunkohle. Zeitschrift fur die Gesammten Naturwissenschaften, 27, 1 - 11.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype
: Not located; possibly MLUH; illustrated in the original description (Pl. I– II ).

Holotype
: Not located; possibly MZUS; illustrated in the original description (Pl. XX ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype
: Not designated; description based on the literature ( Fritz 1992 ); “type” illustrated in Schoepff (1792 :Pl. 1) and Sturn (1828:Pl. III, Fig. c).

Holotype
: Not designated; description based on the literature ( Fritz 1992 ); “type” illustrated in Sturm (1828 :Pl. III, Fig. a, b).
Holotype : Not designated; description based on the literature ( Fritz 1992 ); “type” illustrated in Brandt & Ratzenburg (1829:Pl. XXI ).

Syntypes
(number uncertain): ZIN 70 designated lectotype by Fritz (1992:66 ; illustrated in the original description (Pl. III ); reproduced by Fritz (1992:66) .

bibRefCitation.author: Fritz, U.
bibRefCitation.refString: Fritz, U. (1989) Zur innerartlichen Variabilitat von Emys orbicularis (Linnaeus, 1758). 1. Eine neue Unterart de Europaischen Sumpfschildkrote aus Kleinasien Emys orbicularis luteofusca subsp. nov. Salamandra, 25, 143 - 168.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype
: SMNS 4615:1 ( Schlüter & Hallermann 1997:10 ;photographed in the original description, p. 146, Fig. 2a, and p. 148, Fig. 3);
paratypes
(4; all photographed in the original description, p. 146–147, Fig. 2), SMNS 4615:2, 5474, and 5493 ( Schlüter & Hallermann 1997:9 ); MTD 29137 .
